comment: very good quality and its a handliing is comfortable.

name: Dickerson Langley
comment: These hair dryer are perfect, everything I could ask for. Correct, affordable, and on time.

name: Todd Murphy
comment: Takes time to deliver but it's understandable as it's an oversea parcel. Good and authentic product!

name: Cunningham Sharp
comment: I received one of my hair dryer and the select  was a bit to small for me, just applied to have this sent back, and this was replaced free of charge to the correct size in a short time. Well Done & Thanks. Highly recommended.
